document_data.name: ''Blessed Sword of Tyr''
document_data.mainbody:
The '''''Blessed Sword of Tyr''''' was an enchanted [[greatsword]] wielded by [[Nayeli Goldflower]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{quote|''The Lord of Justice blessed this sword and my mission on his behalf.''|Nayeli Goldflower}}
document_data.Description: The ''Blessed Sword of Tyr'' was a hefty two-handed [[sword]] with a red haft and an octagonal pommel.
document_data.Powers:
[[File:Blessed sword of tyr model.png|thumb|''Nayeli, clutching her Blessed Sword of Tyr.'']]
Nayeli's greatsword was enchanted by [[Tyr]]'s divine magic, improving its ability to deal damage. When wielded in battle against multiple adversaries, the sword had a one in four change of releasing a wave of magic, damaging a row of targets with one swing.
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Nayeli Goldflower]]: a [[paladin]] from the city of [[Daggerford]] and an adventurer who worked with other warriors of [[Waterdeep]], performing missions on behalf of [[Laeral Silverhand]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
